Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC/Halsted
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC/Halsted due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC/Halsted due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 79th
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
